message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which is valued at $120 by you. I am proposing to sell it to you for $110. This is a great opportunity to get a high-quality item at a reasonable price.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate the opportunity, but I'm looking to pay closer to $105 for the product.  This would be a fair price for both of us, as it's still above your value of $100.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to come to an agreement that benefits both of us. I am willing to consider $107 as the price for the product.
